trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There was one other sighting in Stephenville on or around January 30th 2009
Summary: 2 bright lights moving SSW of Stephenville Tx.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i were coming back from ft worth on hwy 377 on jan 30 2009. 1\2 mile north of stephenville city limit we witnessed 2 bright lights that appeared to be heading in a direction ssw just to the west of the city of dublin tx. the lights were quite bright with a very slight yellow to amber tint. the sky was clear and the time on my car clock was 7:00 pm exactly. unfortunately i did not pull over as there was not an appropriate shoulder to do so. but as i slowed, for 1-1\2 to 2 minutes, my wife and i witnessed the 2 lights that were the same distance apart. (i did not have a good reference to establish distance apart or distance away from us). i estimated the altitude at 1000 to 1500 ft. the light on our right became 2 then 3 lights while the light on our left remained static. if you can imagine the following 'o' as lights: o o becoming o oo and then o ooo then o o. the lights were brighter than a small plane and did not flash or beacon. unfortunately hwy 377 entering stephenville drops off a rise that hid the lights from our view as the lights dropped below the tree tops.
